thread.title: Siddharth sings his next Thaikkudam song
thread.title_full: Siddharth sings his next Thaikkudam song - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Siddharth sings his next Thaikkudam song
text:
Singer Siddharth Menon has fallen in love. With None, but with his latest rendition.
The Thaikkudam Bridge singer had posted on a social networking platform, by saying," 'One' is out for you and me . I can't say how much I am in love with this song... Videographed by none other than 'Littl Swayamp'.. Thaikkudam cudnt have asked for a better video... And it makes me more happy as this 'One' is sung by me.. Like I said, trying out a different style of singing this time.. So get ready for a ride through our rich countryside.. Thaikkudam Bridge proudly Presents ... The One- from our debut album Navarasam !!"
The singer who is taking baby steps as an actor in Mollywood with On the Rocks , has sung various songs for Malayalam films. Thumpi Penne from Bangalore Days and Neerpalunkin from Vegam are some of the songs he has crooned.
